contents.text: Welcome to Quip in San Francisco, where we help teams work together faster and get more done.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For a live product demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live product demo to see how Quip can speed up our team’s workflow.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of Quip’s collaboration tools to help coordinate my veteran support group.
Schedule a deep-dive demo of Quip’s API integration and collaboration features.
I’d like to schedule a live product demonstration so I can see how Quip works step by step.
I want a live demo of Quip’s collaborative note-taking features for our physics research group.

contents.text: Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing team.

navigationGoals: I need detailed pricing and licensing options to evaluate Quip for my department.
I need details on Quip’s pricing tiers and whether there’s a discount for military veterans.
Discuss enterprise licensing tiers and volume discount pricing for Quip deployment.
I need clear information on Quip’s pricing tiers and licensing options.
I’d like information about academic pricing and licensing options for students.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
If you are an existing customer and need technical support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m an existing customer experiencing a sync error and need technical support.
I’m having trouble accessing our shared veteran outreach documents and need technical assistance.
Troubleshoot a failed API call in Quip's integration environment.
I’m an existing user and need technical help setting up or troubleshooting the app.
I need technical support with syncing my lab report documents in Quip.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have a billing inquiry: I need to review my latest invoice and update my payment method.
I want to review my latest invoice and update my payment method for my Quip subscription.
Review and adjust my Quip subscription billing and usage metrics.
I need help understanding my recent bill and the charges on my account.
I want to inquire about my billing statement and update our account payment method.
